The Quranic researcher said to him: I do not realize what is broken because of the matter of her matter in the statement that it is not among the things that the minds of creation are obtained.And he read to God, the Exalted of God, His face and the goodness, with the difference from him and Ibn Muhaisin, Hamid and Harun on the authority of Abu Amr: And also about the good: “Let us rely” by adding the spite and deleting the guarantee of the collection, and it was said: He is a return for every concern with the adoption that it is a number of it, and it is not.And his supporters are based on what you have heard in his readers there.And on the authority of Abu Amr:
